actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for a partial exclusion of veterans' pensions from an individual's income for purposes of determinating his or her eligibility for supplemental security income benefits.

summary.text: Amends Title XVI (Supplemental Security Income for the Aged, Blind, and Disabled) of the Social Security Act to permit the exclusion of up to $240 per year of income from a veterans' pension in computing the veterans' income for the purpose of determining his or her eligibility for supplemental security income benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for a partial exclusion of veterans' pensions from an individual's income for purposes of determinating his or her eligibility for supplemental security income benefits.
